text: Let not your heart be troubled. Believe in God; believe also in Me.

segments.phrase: Let not your heart be troubled
Believe in God; believe also in Me

spoken_lines.speaker: son
spoken_lines.line: I see your chest shaking. I'm speaking directly to that shaking. Breathe.

spoken_lines.speaker: father
spoken_lines.line: Lean your fear against Me, not against yourself. You don't have to self-parent this moment.

body_note: Heart and diaphragm want to clench in panic. He names that directly and calls safety over it.

text: In My Father's house are many rooms... I go to prepare a place for you.

segments.phrase: In My Father's house are many rooms
I go to prepare a place for you

spoken_lines.speaker: father
spoken_lines.line: You are wanted. There is literal space with your name on it.

spoken_lines.speaker: son
spoken_lines.line: Your legs don't have to keep searching for belonging. You're not homeless in the Spirit.

body_note: Knees and feet stop wandering for approval because 'place' is already promised.
